Success.GivtSummary: Givt offers you a personal summary and an overview for your tax statement. Managing your tax statement has never been so easy!

ReceiptEmail.SpamText: Don’t worry, we won’t send you any spam.

PaymentFailure.SubTitle: If you didn't cancel the donation by yourself, try a different method.
Payment.BancontactExplanation: After entering your first and last name you will be redirected to the safe environment of Bancontact where you can complete your donation.

EmailRegistration.Subtitle: Fill in your email address to see your personal overview.
EmailRegistration.ConfirmationTitle: Are you sure you want to continue?
EmailRegistration.ConfirmationText: If you continue without filling in your e-mail address, you won’t be able to see any information about your gifts and won’t have a personal overview.
